name: I need to pee
description:
An adventure game about overcoming difficulties. 

This game describes my feelings in 2020. You want something that can be archived pretty easily but still fight some difficulties which are silly and absurd. The year 2020 has been a disaster. 2020 was a beautiful mess. Just like this game.

Rules: AD of left-right arrow keys for moving, space to get up! Good luck!
